data.eml:eml: A new sand frog from Namaqualand, South Africa (Pyxicephalidae: Tomopterna)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wilson, Lyle, Channing, Alan (2019): A new sand frog from Namaqualand, South Africa (Pyxicephalidae: Tomopterna). Zootaxa 4609 (2): 225-246, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4609.2.2
